About Sammys Pizza Woodland Sammys Pizza Woodland is a Fast Food restaurant located at 4011 Woodland Ave in Duluth, MN . Sammys Pizza Woodland has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 5 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, Pizza, Take Out Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
